name: Alaska Airlines Dash 8 Q400 - OAK Oakland to PDX Portland
description:
In this short video, I take an Alaska Airlines flight between Oakland, CA and Portland, OR. The service is operated by a Horizon Air Dash 8 Q400. It was absolutely freezing on this night so the outdoor boarding and deplaning was not welcome!

The report features all aspects of the flight (no lounge at OAK though...), some views of San Francisco and the Bay Area at nightfall, and a very turbulent landing in Portland.

I hope you enjoy the video!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
